content.body: Not the review - github reviews can’t be moderated. I can hide the other one tho
I meant like preventing them from commenting on tc39 repos

content.body: yeah, I could block them - but usually we don’t do that for 2 incoherent posts
if it keeps happening I’ll be happy to do it tho
but yeah I guess may as well wait to see if there's more tomorrow
